      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(processing.core.PApplet applet,
                   String filename)
        Save an intrinsic calibration. Store a calibration, either in XML (Papart) or YAML (opencv) format. It also stores the extrinsic calibration.
        Parameters:
        applet -
        filename - path, can end with ".xml" or ".yaml"

      • saveTo

        public void saveTo(processing.core.PApplet applet,
                   String filename,
                   boolean isCamera)
        Save an intrinsic calibration. Store a calibration, either in XML (Papart) or YAML (opencv) format. It also stores the extrinsic calibration.
        Parameters:
        applet -
        filename - path, can end with ".xml" or ".yaml"
        isCamera - true if it is a camera, false is it is a projector.
